Solstice Yoga Studio.mission: Solstice Yoga Studio was founded to bring mindful movement and holistic wellness into the heart of its neighborhood. We believe every person deserves a safe, welcoming space to practice yoga and find their inner strength.
Solstice Yoga Studio.products: In-studio yoga classes (vinyasa, yin, hatha), small group workshops (sound baths, meditation, yoga therapy), private one-to-one sessions, and an online library of recorded classes. We also sell branded yoga mats, blocks, apparel, and wellness accessories.
Solstice Yoga Studio.audience: Adults 25-60, skewing female but inclusive of all genders. Many live or work locally or regionally, health-conscious, middle to upper income. They seek authentic, community-focused wellness experiences.

Iron Will Fitness.mission: Iron Will Fitness is a boutique strength training studio that empowers individuals to build both physical and mental resilience. We believe that true strength comes from within and that every person has the potential to exceed their own expectations.
Iron Will Fitness.products: Personal training sessions, small group strength classes, powerlifting coaching, nutrition counseling, and specialized programs for athletes and beginners. We also offer online coaching and custom workout plans.
Iron Will Fitness.audience: Fitness enthusiasts aged 25-50 who are serious about strength training and personal development. They value personalized attention, expert coaching, and a supportive community that pushes them to be their best.

Zen Pilates Studio.mission: Zen Pilates Studio combines the precision of classical Pilates with mindfulness practices to create a unique mind-body experience. We help our clients build core strength, improve posture, and find inner balance through intentional movement.
Zen Pilates Studio.products: Classical Pilates classes, reformer sessions, mat Pilates, private instruction, prenatal Pilates, and specialized programs for rehabilitation and athletic performance. We also offer virtual classes and home practice guides.
Zen Pilates Studio.audience: Health-conscious adults aged 25-65 who appreciate the mind-body connection. Many are professionals seeking stress relief, athletes looking to improve performance, or individuals recovering from injuries who need gentle yet effective exercise.

Flow State Dance.mission: Flow State Dance is Austin's premier contemporary dance studio where movement meets mindfulness. We believe dance is a powerful form of self-expression and healing that can transform lives and build community.
Flow State Dance.products: Contemporary dance classes, choreography workshops, dance therapy sessions, performance opportunities, and specialized programs for all ages. We also offer virtual classes and dance fitness programs.
Flow State Dance.audience: Creative individuals aged 18-50 who are drawn to expressive movement and artistic community. Many are professionals seeking creative outlets, students exploring dance, or adults returning to dance after years away.

Mindful Movement Wellness.mission: Mindful Movement Wellness is Miami's holistic wellness center where ancient practices meet modern science. We help busy professionals and wellness seekers find balance, reduce stress, and cultivate mindfulness through movement and meditation.
Mindful Movement Wellness.products: Yoga classes, meditation sessions, breathwork workshops, sound healing, wellness coaching, and corporate wellness programs. We also offer retreats, online courses, and personalized wellness plans.
Mindful Movement Wellness.audience: Health-conscious professionals aged 25-55 who are seeking stress relief, work-life balance, and holistic wellness approaches. Many are dealing with high-pressure jobs, chronic stress, or are new to wellness practices.
